Title: Relates to the identification of transportation network company drivers and vehicles
Summary: Requires the issuance and display of a TNC driver identification card which includes such driver's name, photograph and license plate number, and additionally requires each TNC vehicle to display an illuminated sign indicating the TNC for which the TNC driver is providing the TNC service or TNC prearranged trip; requires rules to implement a machine-readable code or image.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the identification of transportation network company drivers and vehicles
